t: Who can create a Brand Store?
Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads
s: Your Brand Store is a storefront where your brand can engage, convert, and build loyalty with millions of Amazon shoppers. On your Brand Store, you can showcase your full suite of products, drive product education, and tell your unique story with engaging content like lifestyle imagery or videos.

t: Launch your brand on Amazon.in with 0% referral fee
s: Start your brand’s Amazon.in journey by enrolling it in Amazon Brand Registry for free. After enrolling, you become eligible to activate a suite of brand-building tools and protection benefits. You can enroll your brand even if you don’t sell in the Amazon.in store.

t: The Paradox Of Growing A Brand On Amazon
s: April 26, 2021 - Reaching customers organically among Amazon’s ocean of products is increasingly challenging. While there may be more Prime members and shoppers, the competition among sellers and vendors who compete on valuable SEO terms is such that many brands turn to paid advertising on Amazon.
